headline: Duke Energy Weighs Clean Energy Growth Against Insider Selling Signals
summary: Duke Energy (NYSE:DUK) is expanding its solar, battery storage, and microgrid projects to support grid resilience and broader use of distributed energy resources. The company is rolling out incentives for customers to participate in virtual power plant programs that aggregate home and business resources to support the grid. Recent filings also show sizeable insider share sales by senior executives, which may draw investor attention to management’s current positioning. Duke Energy, trading...
